name: Next Day Delivery!
description:
Get your goods even quicker. 

We can promise, next day delivery if orders are placed before 12pm.

This will increase the postage of your item to £6.95 if purchasing one item. 

Extra costs are applied for more than one item.

UK only.

Please note last day for Christmas delivery is 23rd December 2013 using this service.

name: Bracelet Gift Tube
description:
We wanted to show you our new packaging!

Every bracelet order is sent in a branded suede pouch, but for an extra £2.50 we will coil your bracelet into a specimen tube for you to give as an unique gift.

name: Gift Box
description:
We wanted to show you our new packaging!

Every order is sent in a branded suede pouch, but for an extra £2.50 we will add a branded box and ribbon, for you to give as an extra special gift.

name: Hand Carved Amethyst Lavender Ring
description:
A striking, one of a kind pale amethyst drusy geode ring, no two rings are ever the same, every piece a work of art.

The ring is made in Brazil and hand polished from one single piece of amethyst crystal, all of the stripes and patterns in the ring are completely natural.

Polished to a smooth band, these rings adjust to the the body's temperature, light in weight too they are very comfortable to wear.

All stones are sourced ethically from Brazil, only the highest quality selected.

Every piece is one of a kind and can never be replicated, that said, sometimes rings are carved from the same crystal so can look similar- please ask if you require a different size.

Fissures, dark shadows and hairline cracks are all part of the beauty of the crystal, these are not flaws they are the natural characteristics of the stone, however if you are unhappy with your purchase we are happy to offer an exchange.

As the rings are a natural material they can be worn in water and dried with a soft cloth.

Crystal is a fragile material and can chip and break if knocked or dropped, please take care when wearing and avoid tapping on surfaces.

As the rings are a natural material they can be worn in water and dried with a soft cloth.

Crystal is a fragile material and can chip and break if knocked or dropped, please take care when wearing and avoid tapping on surfaces.

Ring size UK P ( Medium )

name: Statement Citrine Semi Precious Pendant
description:
A striking piece of nature. Decadorn's citrine pendant is the perfect statement piece for this winter. The natural pendant sparkles in a 9ct gold dipped setting.

The stone is left in it's natural shape to showcase its true beauty.

A rich caramel shade of citrine, this really is a luxurious and beautiful piece for the style conscious shopper.

Citrine has been called the "Stone of the mind".

It is thought to increase self esteem, protect from negative energy and open the mind to new thoughts.

Citrine is also thought to be a lucky stone and bring money to the wearer.

Delivered wrapped in tissue paper and a soft suede branded pouch.

Due to the nature of the product, the pendant you receive may differ slightly from what is photographed.

To keep your product sparkling, keep away from water and perfume and clean with a dry, lint free cloth.

Dimensions: 
Stone is approx 4cm in diameter.

name: Amethyst Aged Bloom Stalactite Pendant
description:
A natural, unique signature piece, the stalactite sparkles in a 9ct gold plated setting.

The pendant is left in it's natural form in all its glory, delicately dipped in 9ct gold. Every piece is one of a kind and has a different pattern either side.

The finish of these pendants have a natural aged look, the colours are chalky and soft.

Stalactites are formed when a single drop of mineral rich water falls from the ceiling of a cave, leaving behind a tiny ring shaped calcium deposit. With each subsequent drop, tiny mineralised rings build on top of one another to eventually form an icicle-like column of crystals.

Pendant comes on a 24"or 18" gold dipped chain.

Delivered wrapped in tissue paper and a soft suede branded pouch.

Due to the nature of the product, the pendant you receive may differ slightly from what is photographed. These are hand selected natural stones, each piece is very beautiful and unique.

Brass based metal dipped in 9ct Gold.

To keep your sparkler sparkling, keep away from water and perfume and clean with a dry, lint free cloth.

Stone approx 2 x 1.5 cm diameter.

A rich purple tiny amethyst has been set inside the geode to create a unique and beautiful piece for the style conscious shopper.

name: Polka Semi Precious Drusy Pendant
description:
Striking Drusy Quartz miniature circle pendant, dipped in 9ct Gold.

All these stones are semi precious dyed drusy, because of this every pendant varies slightly in stone, size, shape. Every pair is completely unique!

The term "Drusy" refers to the tiny crystal which is formed within or on another stone in a large number. When the ground water that carries dissolved silica is forced to to get filled into a porous area of rock, rapid cooling occurs and it causes the formation of minute small sparkling quartz crystals in tiny cavities.

Presented in a suede, branded gift pouch.

Dimensions:
Chain length: 18" Gold dipped
Approx 0.8cm diameter

name: Semi Precious Slate Grey Drusy Stud Earrings
description:
Stunning drusy quartz studs, with 9ct gold dipped earring posts and backings.

These earrings are one of a kind and make a great gift.

Made from natural quartz drusy and then dyed. All earring pairs vary slightly in stone, size, shape, every pair is completely unique.

The term "Drusy" refers to the tiny crystal which is formed within or on another stone in a large number. When the ground water that carries dissolved silica is forced to to get filled into a porous area of rock, rapid cooling occurs and it causes the formation of minute small sparkling quartz crystals in tiny cavities.

They will be posted in a gift pouch.

Avoid contact with water and perfume.

name: Black Leather And Crystal Wrap Bracelet
description:
Made from supple leather and faceted crystal beads. 

It wraps four to five times round the wrist.

This bracelet makes a great gift as it is fully adjustable, suitable for all ages and compliments any outfit.

Easy to take on and off with a simple button hole fastening.

Every order is sent in a branded suede pouch, great to give as a gift.

All our jewellery is nickel free and hypo-allergenic.

To keep the bracelet looking at it's best, avoid direct contact with water or perfume. Keep inside the pouch provided when not worn.

The length of the bracelet is 81.28 cm (32") and fully adjustable. 

It will fit any wrist size.
